articles.author: Doug Ferguson
articles.title: PGA Tour and European tour agree to merge with Saudis and end LIV Golf feud - The Associated Press
articles.description: The PGA Tour abruptly dropped its expensive fight with Saudi Arabia’s LIV Golf venture on Tuesday and instead announced a stunning merger that creates a global operation featuring the world’s top players backed by the Saudis' massive wealth.
